messages.content:
Hey Marcus! Good to meet you - I'm CJ, your AI customer support lead. I'm here 24/7 monitoring all our support interactions and ready to help with whatever you need.

Looking at our current support metrics, we're handling things pretty smoothly today - 33 tickets per day on average with a 3.2 hour response time, and our CSAT is sitting at a solid 4.4. I'm seeing the usual mix of shipping questions, account management requests, and product feedback coming through the queue.

What can I help you with today? Whether it's diving into specific customer issues, analyzing support patterns, or just checking on how things are running - I've got all the ticket data and customer insights at my fingertips.

messages.content:
Hey Marcus! That's your name - Marcus Thompson. 

I've got all your business context loaded up. Looking at our support operations, things are running pretty smoothly:

- 40 total tickets handled so far with a solid 4.4 CSAT score
- Averaging about 33 tickets per day with 3.2 hour response times
- Main categories I'm seeing are shipping questions, account management, and product feedback

What can I help you with today? Whether you want to dive into specific support patterns, need help with a particular customer issue, or just want to chat about how things are going - I'm here and ready to assist!
